content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: Low volatility (Vol: 13.2%) with moderate participation (Breadth: 4/8 sectors positive); environment favors cyclicals but breadth is only lukewarm.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Transportation and Banking lead; Transportation ABOVE TREND: THYAO (1W: +1.84% | 1M: +0.36%) ABOVE TREND, PGSUS (1W: +4.44% | 1M: +3.53%) ABOVE TREND; Banking ABOVE TREND: VAKBN (1W: +5.00% | 1M: +16.22%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +3.24% | 1M: +15.99%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Energy & Chemicals and Technology & Telecom lag; Energy & Chemicals BELOW TREND/CORRECTION: TUPRS (1W: -6.58% | 1M: -9.95%) BELOW TREND, PETKM (1W: -2.99% | 1M: -1.75%) BELOW TREND; Technology & Telecom CORRECTION: TCELL (1W: -3.07% | 1M: +4.45%) CORRECTION, KONTR (1W: -4.25% | 1M: -53.51%) BELOW TREND.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
TRALT (1W: +12.59% | 1M: +5.87%) ABOVE TREND; VAKBN (1W: +5.00% | 1M: +16.22%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +4.85% | 1M: +1.17%) ABOVE TREND; PGSUS (1W: +4.44% | 1M: +3.53%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +3.48% | 1M: +14.38%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
TUPRS (1W: -6.58% | 1M: -9.95%) BELOW TREND; VESTL (1W: -5.02% | 1M: +0.98%) CORRECTION; OYAKC (1W: -4.82% | 1M: +7.54%) CORRECTION; KONTR (1W: -4.25% | 1M: -53.51%) BELOW TREND; ULKER (1W: -3.89% | 1M: -2.11%) BELOW TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Upside momentum: TRALT (1W: +12.59% | 1M: +5.87%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +5.00% | 1M: +16.22%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +4.85% | 1M: +1.17%) ABOVE TREND. Downside momentum: TUPRS (1W: -6.58% | 1M: -9.95%) BELOW TREND, VESTL (1W: -5.02% | 1M: +0.98%) CORRECTION.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking is a clear outperformer; AKBNK (1W: +3.24% | 1M: +15.99%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +1.14% | 1M: +4.80%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +0.79% | 1M: +9.36%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +1.21% | 1M: +7.41%) ABOVE TREND — overweight selective high-quality names and follow earnings/asset quality prints.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry mixed but resilient: ASELS (1W: +3.48% | 1M: +14.38%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +3.04% | 1M: +9.12%) ABOVE TREND, EREGL (1W: +0.00% | 1M: +0.49%) NEUTRAL, FROTO (1W: -1.60% | 1M: +6.45%) CORRECTION — favor exporters and defense names.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy & Chemicals are under pressure; TRALT (1W: +12.59% | 1M: +5.87%) ABOVE TREND is an outlier, while TUPRS (1W: -6.58% | 1M: -9.95%) BELOW TREND, PETKM (1W: -2.99% | 1M: -1.75%) BELOW TREND, SISE (1W: -3.10% | 1M: +7.42%) CORRECTION highlight divergent moves — tactical underweight overall.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk-ON call: overweight Banking, Transportation and selected Retail/Defense; underweight Energy, Technology and discretionary holdings showing downside momentum. Keep cash buffer for volatility spikes and trim positions with negative 1W and 1M confirmation.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
TRALT (1W: +12.59% | 1M: +5.87%) ABOVE TREND for continuation; VAKBN (1W: +5.00% | 1M: +16.22%) ABOVE TREND on bank flows; AKBNK (1W: +3.24% | 1M: +15.99%) ABOVE TREND for sector momentum; TUPRS (1W: -6.58% | 1M: -9.95%) BELOW TREND as a downside-reversion candidate; KONTR (1W: -4.25% | 1M: -53.51%) BELOW TREND for volatility watch.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Banking (flow-driven) and Transportation (seasonal demand) plus Retail (earnings/consumption sensitivity).

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Monitor XU100 reaction around near-term highs for continuation and prior support for risk-off flips; key catalysts: CBRT communications, domestic macro prints (inflation, industrial production), global risk sentiment and oil moves that will drive Energy & Chemicals.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
RISK-ON tape with low volatility but only moderate sector participation; banks and transportation are driving leadership while Energy and Tech lag. Tactical overweight in banking, select industrials and retail; keep stops on names showing confirmed 1W and 1M weakness.
